titleInfo.title: Ext 2840/46 'Rebinding of Lt Col Sir A.T. Willson's book "The Persian Gulf"'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 32; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of correspondence between the Persian Gulf Residency, India Office, and the Governor of Baluchistan regarding the rebinding and circulation of The Persian Gulfby Sir Arnold Talbot Wilson and the Bushire Church Book to the Times Book Club.
